plugin.name: Calcium Noise Analysis
plugin.author: George
plugin.description: Comprehensive calcium imaging noise analysis toolkit integrating traditional signal processing algorithms, noise characterization, and event detection methods.
plugin.long_description: Calcium Noise Analysis provides production-quality tools for characterizing and analyzing noise in calcium imaging data. Features include power spectral density analysis, SD fluctuation processing, shot noise characterization with Anscombe transforms, multiple F0 baseline estimation methods, dF/F calculation, calcium spark detection, local correlation images, noise metric computation, and Butterworth bandpass filtering. Based on research from CASCADE, Swaminathan et al. 2020, Lock and Parker 2020 (FLIKA), and Suite2p methodologies. Optimized for TIRF microscopy and calcium imaging workflows.
